snippet: Political documentaries, rediscovered works and pre-code films are part of the Museum of Modern Art’s “To Save and Project” program, which celebrates film preservation.
abstract: Dave Kehr welcomes To Save and Project, the Museum of Modern Art's international celebration of film preservation, now in its 10th year; program features about 75 films from 15 countries, in practically every conceivable format, that have been rescued from physical deterioration or commercial neglect.
lead_paragraph: Political documentaries, rediscovered works and pre-code films are part of the Museum of Modern Art’s “To Save and Project” program, which celebrates film preservation.

headline.seo: ‘To Save and Project’: The Modern Exalts Film Preservation
headline.main: Restoring Film Gems, Pre-Code or Political
headline.print_headline: Restoring Film Gems, Pre-Code Or Political
